original_text: After that, they were preparing to go to bed. Then all the men who lived in Sodom came to Lot's house. They were old men and young men, who came from every part of the city. They stood all round the house.
korean_text: 그들이 눕기 전에 그 성 사람 곧 소돔 백성들이 노소를 막론하고 원근에서 다 모여 그 집을 에워싸고

sentences.original_text: After that, they were preparing to go to bed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그들은 잠자리에 들려고 준비하고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Then all the men who lived in Sodom
They were old men and young men,
who came from every part of the city.
They stood all round the house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 집 주위에 모두 서 있었다.
